wiki.content:
"Hot N Cold" is a song by American singer Katy Perry. The song was written and composed by Dr. Luke, Max Martin and Perry for her second album, One of the Boys.
 
 The track was released as the album's second single. It reached number three on the Billboard Hot 100.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Hot N Cold" is a song by American singer Katy Perry. The song was written and composed by Dr. Luke, Max Martin and Perry for her second album, One of the Boys.  The track was released as the album's second single. It reached number three on the Billboard Hot 100.
